channel.title: Why doesent it work?!

item.title: Why doesent it work?!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You see the /* at the top and the */ at the bottom of the code? Having those in there effectively tells the compiler to completely ignore everything between them.

Read full topic

item.title: Why doesent it work?!
item.dc:creator: @Deller7 Deller7
item.description:
@Deller7 wrote:

case 155: //first Click npc int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000); int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; boolean FishingGo = false; boolean PutNPCCoords = false; if (NPCID == 1552) // Santa { sendMessage("Santa: HO! HO! HO! Merry Christmas!"); addItem(Item2.randomSanta(), 3); }

It compiles fine but it dont work!

I made a new Random called RandomOutfit but the Npc drop wont work!

/*else if (npcs[i].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomOutfit(), npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(npcs[i].npcType), false); //KBD dead } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 50) { client.addItem(Item2.randomOutfit(), 1); //KBD dead }*/ else { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; //human dead }

Any help?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 10:23:18 AM[/size][hr]Nvm now it works, I mean the Npc drop but why not the Santa!?
